name: Cold Bite
description: Cold Bite is a top-down shooter in which the player fights endless waves of zombies. Build turrets, level up, and hold them off as long as you can!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: 1.6 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Any DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 16 MB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: 2.0GHz + Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Any DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 16 MB available space Sound Card: Any
